main event: An unidentified object was sighted near Bitburg Air Base, Germany on April 14, 1960.
interesting points: The object was described as cylindrical in shape, approximately 60-70 feet in length.
The object was observed to make a rapid ascent and then a rapid descent.
The object was observed by Captain Berger of the U.S. Air Force.
No photographs or other exhibits were included in the report.
The report concluded the object was an unidentified flying object.
sighted object: a cylindrical object approximately 60-70 feet in length
